text:
Example: Confidence interval
Consider a practice exam that was administered to 36 Level I candidates. The mean
score on this practice exam was 80. Assuming a population standard deviation equal
to 15, construct and interpret a 99% confidence interval for the mean score on the
practice exam for 36 candidates. Note that in this example the population standard
deviation is known, so we don't have to estimate it.
Answer:
